abstract: Tenacity and grit displayed by Hillary Clinton throughout her political career and during long, fraught presidential campaign has strengthened her appeal among voters and may prove effective in overcoming Donald Trump in general election; Clinton's toughness has in particular drawn older women, blacks and others who see their own struggles in her perseverance.

headline.print_headline: A Long Journey, Fueled by Grit, to the Finish

snippet: As a politician’s wife, first lady, senator and secretary of state — and as a two-time candidate for president — Hillary Clinton has continually redefined the role of women in American politics.
lead_paragraph: As a politician’s wife, first lady, senator and secretary of state — and as a two-time candidate for president — Hillary Clinton has continually redefined the role of women in American politics.
